desc: Dustcuff provides you with the solution for modern, dust free, tile removal methods. HAVOC is an advanced tool designed to attach to your demo hammer and extract dust created during tile removal. STORM is the first, and only, dust extraction tool that works with an SDS Plus design. Best dust clean up with tile removal.

layout.text:
Dustcuff provides you with the solution for modern,
dust free, tile removal methods.
